Row.SQL: SELECT GovernmentType as PageId, "Government" as PageGroupId, "Government" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Governments

SELECT Policies.PolicyType as PageId, GovernmentSlotType as PageGroupId, "Policy" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Policies LEFT OUTER JOIN Policies_XP1 on Policies.PolicyType = Policies_XP1.PolicyType WHERE Policies_XP1.RequiresDarkAge IS NULL or Policies_XP1.RequiresGoldenAge IS NULL or Policies_XP1.RequiresDarkAge <> 1 and Policies_XP1.RequiresGoldenAge <> 1

SELECT Policies.PolicyType as PageId, "DARK_POLICIES" as PageGroupId, "Policy" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Policies LEFT OUTER JOIN Policies_XP1 on Policies.PolicyType = Policies_XP1.PolicyType WHERE Policies_XP1.RequiresDarkAge = 1

SELECT Policies.PolicyType as PageId, "GOLDEN_POLICIES" as PageGroupId, "Policy" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Policies LEFT OUTER JOIN Policies_XP1 on Policies.PolicyType = Policies_XP1.PolicyType WHERE Policies_XP1.RequiresGoldenAge = 1
